snippet: The prevalence of both Type 1 and Type 2 diabetes drastically increased among youth across racial groups from 2001 to 2009, a study found.
abstract: Analysis published in Journal of the American Medical Association confirms that from 2001 to 2009 the incidence of Type 1 and Type 2 diabetes drastically increased among children and adolescents across racial groups.
lead_paragraph: The prevalence of both Type 1 and Type 2 diabetes drastically increased among youth across racial groups from 2001 to 2009, a study found.

headline.main: Study Reveals Sizable Increase in Diabetes Among Children
headline.print_headline: Study Reveals Sizable Increase in Diabetes Among Children

keywords.value: Journal of the American Medical Assn
keywords.name: organizations
